name: Bro-Cube: Infinity
description:
Bro-Code: Infinity is a roguelike game with endless waves of enemies coming at you! Lightweight and requiring no mouse, this game is a perfect time-waster for classes, meetings, or any other boring scenario.

FEATURES:
  • Endless waves of enemies, number of enemies increasing every wave
  • No mouse needed!
  • Enemies could drop a lootbox, where you can collect a random item
  • Healing drops by enemies

and more!

INSTALLATION:

Download the zip file, move it to wherever you want and then unzip it. Open 'BroCube.exe' and play!
